task.title: HOW TO MAKE A FROZEN DESSERT: VANILLA ICE CREAM

taskbody.context:
INGREDIENTS:
1 ½ Cups Whole Milk
1 Cup Plus 2 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar
1 Pinch Kosher Salt
3 Cups Heavy Cream
1 ½ Tablespoons Pure Vanilla Extract
STEPS:

step.cmd: Take the freezer bowl from out of the freezer and put it on the base of the appliance in Room 360.
Put the mixing arm in the bowl with the circular side facing up.
Put the lid on the base and turn it clockwise until the mechanism clicks into a locked position.
Turn the appliance on by plugging in the cord to a nearby outlet in the back of the room.

substep.cmd: With a hand mixer or whisk, whichever is readily available in Shanks kitchen, mix the milk, sugar, and salt until the granules are dissolved.
Mix in heavy cream and vanilla.
Cover with your name clealry marked and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours or up to 12 hours in the Room 380 refrigerator.
substep.stepresult: Once chilled, the mixture will be a semi-solid consistency. (For a thicker ice cream, let the mixture refrigerate for longer or until the mixture becomes more solid.)

step.cmd: Press "Ice Cream, Gelato, or Sorbet" button on the control panel.
Pour the ingredients of the given recipe through the hole in the top of the lid.
Wait 20 minutes as the mixture thickens.
Once the wait time is over, transfer the ice cream to an alternate container to serve or to save for later.
